mapper.insert: insert into report_capital (coin_id, type, amount, fee, hour_index, gmt_begin, gmt_end) values (#{coinId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hourIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtBegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
